prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a muscular human male warrior, spiky black hair, determined expression, orange martial arts gi with blue undershirt, standing in a dynamic battle stance, dramatic lighting
feature_prompt: defined muscles, realistic skin texture, detailed eyes, subtle scars, wristbands, flying hair strands, energy aura
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, chibi, exaggerated eyes, plastic skin, flat lighting, CGI, low quality, deformed anatomy
